title: Maryland Board of Physicians
cleaned_text: July 1, 2023, physicians applying for a Maryland medical license will be required to use the FSMB's [Uniform Application (UA)](https://www.fsmb.org/uniform-application/) for the online Initial Medical Licensure in Maryland and the [FCVS](https://www.fsmb.org/fcvs/) for verifying core credentials Note: The FSMB is waiving the UA fee for Maryland physician applicants for a limited time.
